txt.en: 'Two peoples have been cursed due to your meddling, but no more. Lhucu daughter of Treh√©arn, your people will remain free, provided you undo your father's work.'
'Daughter, how dare you challenge me? Can you not see that we have the means at our disposal to finally retake what should have been ours?'
'Father, you have fallen under the influence of an evil spirit, a Cuthraul of terrible might.  How could you betray your people so?'
'How dare you destroy all that I have worked for? It was all mine!'
'Lhucu, lead [placeholder] from this place. There are things that I and I alone must do here.'
'You have defeated me, but you could never destroy me. This has happened before and may well happen again.'
'Mostun, you have wrought enough damage upon the people that dwell in this place...'
'While neither Man nor beast may harm you, it is within my power to do so. You will be banished from this place for the damage that you have wrought...'
